refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates the training data struct from a user supplied function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
num_data
The number of training data
num_input
The number of inputs per training data
num_output
The number of ouputs per training data
user_function
The user supplied function with following parameters:
num - The number of the training data set num_input - The number of inputs per training data num_output - The number of ouputs per training data
The function should return an associative array with keys input and output and two array values of input and output.
